Users of this Special Skill are exceptional sharpshooters, adept at hitting their target's weakest spots and making every shot count.

{{css_skillbox |black| MARKSMANSHIP | AUTOMATIC SKILL }}
{{skill-label | Obligatory }}

{{requirements}}
* The user may only benefit from this Special Skill when he declares a [[BS Attack]].
{{effects}}
* The user may ignore the negative [[BS]] MODs imposed by [[Partial Cover]], and [[Nanoscreen]].
{{css_skillbox-end}}


{{see-also-start}}
Troopers with Marksmanship are affected by:
* '''[[Albedo]]'''.
* Any item with the '''[[Reflective]]''' Trait.
* '''[[White Noise Zone]]s'''.

The '''[[Assisted Fire]]''' [[Hacking Program]] grants Marksmanship to a [[REM]].
{{see-also-end}}
